msbt.message: Thanks to the Lunar New Year, I have yet another chance to make a fabulous New Year's resolution. Of course, I made a resolution at the start of the yearbut, well, it wasn't quite right for me. This time, however, I shall come up with the perfect one! And I might even stick to it, .
What could be more lovely than spending this auspicious occasion with everyone on the island? I, for one, couldn't be happier! And I simply can't wait to spend the next year with you, !
I just LOVE new beginnings, don't you? It feels like anything might happen, ! I might change my hairstyle! Or my shoe style! In fact, a new year might call for a whole new me.

Today is an auspicious day, you know, which means it is the perfect day to treat myself. Let's see I think I shall eat as much as I like and do absolutely nothing else. You know, , I wouldn't blame you if you did the exact same thing.
You know, it IS the Lunar New Year. And some say it's an auspicious time to make changes to one's life. Don't get me wrong, , you are fabulous just the way you are. I wouldn't change a thing!
